subtitle: In the fourth dimensional matrix, Maldek, a-thriving planet nestled between Jupiter
and Mars, was a world of remarkable complexity and diversity. This celestial body, situated
in what is now known as the asteroid belt, was home to advanced civilization and native
Martian indigenous civilization at the center. The planet’s environment was uniquely suited
to support a wide array of species, which evolved over millennia under its favorable
conditions. However, Maldek's stability was not to last. A series of escalating cosmic conflicts,
driven by the ambitions of the Anakh Empire, led to the planet's downfall. The Anakh Empire,
a new powerful muscular warrior hybrid race with origins in the royal bloodlines of Tiamat
the reptilian queen and Tybarion the lyran prince, sought to expand its dominion across the systems.
In the urban centers of the planet Maldek, the Martians lived in an environment,
guided by deeply ingrained social structures and cultural practices.
Their society was organized into four main communities: the Scholars, the Warriors,
the Merchants, and the Laborers. Each community had its role, determining work
and social interactions. Families lived together in large, joint households,
with the eldest Martian, usually a male, making important decisions and guiding the family.
Amidst the dunes, life thrived in forms both strange and wondrous. Tall, slender cacti-like
plants with translucent crimson spines dotted the landscape, their roots delving deep into the sandy
soil in search of elusive moisture. These plants bloomed sporadically with delicate, bioluminescent
flowers that glowed softly in the darkness, casting pools of iridescent light on the ground.
In the heart of the desert, giant Martian statues known as the "Crimson Guardians"
stood sentinel over the land. These towering monoliths, with their smooth, crimson surfaces
reflecting the light of the suns, were believed to hold spiritual significance for the planet's
indigenous inhabitants. The statues of the ancient Martian founders, standing 60 feet tall,
watched over the landscape, embodying the wisdom and strength of the Martian people.
In a modest home nestled on the outskirt farming dunes of Maldek, lived Hanuman with his family.
Hanuman was renowned for his keen intellect and formidable abilities among the Green Martians—a
race known for their telepathic gifts and shape-shifting abilities. His wife, M'yri'ah,
greeted him with a warm smile and a cup of rejuvenating nectar brewed from the exotic
flora that thrived in the desert's oases. Their daughter, K'hym, burst with youthful energy,
eager to explore the wonders of their world and inherit the wisdom of her parents.
Hanuman served his community as a scholar and advisor in Maldek's capital city. His telepathic
abilities allowed him to communicate effortlessly with his fellow Martians, fostering unity,
his beliefs and values firmly rooted in family, culture, and a higher power known as the creator
of all. The city itself was a marvel of Martian architecture much like their capital planet known
as Mars.....blending ancient stone structures with shimmering bioluminescent flora that
illuminated the night. Hanuman often brought his daughter K'hym with him to the archives,
where they delved into ancient scrolls, uncovering secrets of their ancestors and
cosmic mysteries. It was here that K'hym began to discover her own talents in shape-shifting,
delighting her father with her natural ability to transform into different creatures of Maldek—a
skill that would serve her well in the years to come. Hanuman cautioned her that with great
power comes the duty of responsibility and honor, for that is the way of their people.
As they gazed out, she asked, "Can you tell me the story of the creator of all again?"
He smiled and began.
"Before the stars, all beings, and existence, there was a great spirit named Barbelo. In a
moment of desperation, Barbelo split into two opposite spirits, Mother and Father,
both unaware of each other. The Mother, wounded from the separation from the unity of Barbelo,
birthed the celestial cosmos in the 11th density. She eventually found the Father
in the void. At first, the Father's spirit pushed her away, but the Mother persisted and
maneuvered closer. They eventually connected and merged with each other. From their union,
they gave birth to children: sons of light and sons of darkness."
Hanuman paused from the story and said they must return home before darkness strikes
early. Despite the peaceful tranquility of the world on Maldek, shadows loomed on the horizon.
One fateful day, the celestial hybrid group known as The Anakh descended upon Maldek's landscape,
heralding an era of devastation reminiscent of the ancient Ciakhhr empire. Unbeknownst to
the Martians, The Anakh carried a malicious virus designed to incapacitate and enslave
any species they encountered. The virus targeted the very essence of Martian powers,
rendering them weak and feeble, unable to tap into their abilities. Panic and despair gripped
the Martian populace as many fell ill and were swiftly captured by The Anakh's forces.
Surprised by the invasion, Hanuman used his Martian abilities to fight against the tall Anakh
warrior humanoids raiding the center's archives. Ready to sacrifice his life to protect the records
of ancient Maldek, he thought about his wife and daughter and fled the collapsing capital.
He navigated through invading Anakh flying drone enforcers, enslavement envoys, demolished
buildings, guard posts, and the bodies of his fellow Martians near the outskirts of his home.
Tragically, when he arrived home, he found his wife, M'yri'ah, and daughter, K'hym, had fallen
ill and passed away. Grieving and desperate, Hanuman buried them before narrowly escaping
the clutches of the Atlantean overseers, fleeing into the depths of Maldek's untamed wilderness.
Alone and grieving, Hanuman sought refuge and allies among the few free
Martians who remained hidden. Two of them were from the ancient regions,
while another was an escaped ship captain named Val. Together, they devised a daring plan to
escape Maldek. With Val's help, they commandeered a small spacecraft from The Anakh's seized fleet.
The Anakh Empire, in its quest for supremacy, wielded a planet-destroyer—an immensely powerful
weapon capable of annihilating entire worlds and stars. This weapon, chronicled in ancient
texts such as the Mahabharata, was designed to be a decisive instrument of cosmic warfare.
Under the cover of darkness, they launched their vessel into the void,
navigating through treacherous asteroid fields. As they fled, a beam from the giant
Anakh star-ship struck Maldek, shattering the planet into pieces. The ship narrowly
avoided the shockwaves from the explosion, emerging unscathed from the devastation.
When the destructive force was unleashed upon the planet,
it set off a chain reaction of colossal explosions.
These blasts rippled through Maldek’s core,
causing a series of violent detonations that shattered the planet into a multitude of
fragments. The once cohesive planetary body fractured into countless pieces,
creating a vast asteroid field and scattering debris across the solar system.
The destruction of Maldek resulted in a dramatic transformation of the region between Jupiter and
Mars. Amidst the chaos, the souls of Maldek’s Martian inhabitants that did not survive
found new corporeal forms on Tiamat through the Pleiadians who assisted transcending their souls,
and then seeded mammals that would eventually evolve into primates on Earth. The Pleiadians,
having played a role in cultivating these new life forms, also became key
players in the resistance against the Anakh Empire's destructive ambitions.
In the wake of Maldek's devastation, only a few Martian refugees managed to escape the
cataclysm including a Martian named Hanuman. These survivors were guided by the Andromedan
and Pleiadian council to Planet Tiamat, a sanctuary where they joined the Lemurian
colonies of the ancient Naascals Ramay. Tiamat, already a focal point of cosmic significance,
became a refuge for cosmic refugees fleeing the ravages of the Anakh Empire, when the galactic
federation last visited the colonies of Tiamat, many races were already seeding their own species.
The Ohora system represents the inaugural Anakh outpost within the galaxy, established
approximately 700,000 years ago. Originating from a parallel universe, a prominent scion of
the early Anakh atlantean royal houses, accompanied by a significant retinue,
traversed a cosmic portal situated within the star Arcturus. Upon their arrival at this new
planetary outpost, they designated the star system as Arakh-Nara, translating to "Starlight." Over
time, this designation was simplified to Ohora, becoming the home of the Ohorai,
a hybrid race resultant from the Anakh lineage. High-plasma-density stars like Arcturus, Antares,
and Sirius A are often characterized by singularities at their cores,
which act as natural "stargates" termed "Arakh." The Anakhum, however,
engineered artificial "jump gates" called Ba'ab, which facilitated travel within a single
dimension but lacked the inter-dimensional capabilities inherent to the natural Arakh.
As the Anakh of Nibiru transitioned to their new home, internal schisms began to manifest among
the cosmic refugees. Over millennia, these schisms intensified, shaping a complex civilization marked
by cycles of warfare, remarkable technological advancements, and epochs of primitive development.
Eventually, a modicum of peace was achieved, leading to the emergence of two dominant Atlantean
tribes: one led by An from the North and the other by Antu from the South. To unify their bloodlines
and stabilize their governance, they opted for a marital alliance, establishing a dual monarchy
with representatives from both tribes as the King and Queen of the newly consolidated Anakh Empire.
During this period, a mysterious dark hybrid species of grays, known as the Maytre of Megopei,
emerged in the Andromeda galaxy. The Maytre formed alliances with several dark factions,
including the Ciakhrr, the Alliance of Six, and the Nebu. Their rapid advancement allowed them
to become highly efficient colonizers, overtaking 77 underdeveloped worlds. Their primary objective
was assimilation and dominance over all other beings. Employing advanced cybernetic warfare,
the Maytre launched aggressive attacks on the Galactic Federations' mainframes,
leading to the obliteration of 17 humanoid societies within the Andromedan system.
Their strategic and brutal methods leveraged cutting-edge cyber technology to dismantle
the infrastructural integrity of entire star systems. Queen Tiamat
assembled legions of Ciakhrr Orion Dragons to fight the Maytrei from her homeworld.
An, the foundational king of the Anakh Atlantean Empire,
established his dominion in Nataru, one of the seven galaxies governed by his mother,
Anakim Lu Ra, the Supreme Empress. An adopted the title "Ra," symbolizing supreme ruler,
a designation later inherited by his descendants—Anu, Enlil, and Marduk—during their
reign over the Solar System from their stronghold on Saturn. Upon arriving in the Urus system,
An and his court settled on a planet they named Anshari, laying the groundwork for
their expanding empire and marking the beginning of their enduring influence across the cosmos.
In the early era of the Anakh civilization, the royal empire and its multi-species society
expanded across various star systems. They interbred with other royal kingdoms
from different worlds, establishing robust colonies on the planets they conquered. Upon
arriving on their final planet, Nibiru, many royal family members who developed various colors and
hues from light to dark and slightly pointed ears over the shars giving their future offspring's and
descendants various genetic traits from all worlds conquered. Offspring with mixed genes, however,
would either exhibit bright, melanin-free skin or inherit the genetic traits of the other race
within the first shar of a royal's life, adapting their physical bodies to the genes of their
parents and the diverse worlds they encountered. Extraordinarily, the Atlantean royals had cells
that gave them certain superhuman abilities and skills in certain planetary environments
and due to the large sizes of each planet they inhibited, their stature grew at great heights.
At the inception of the Anakhim Atlantean Empire, the star system in question was devoid of advanced
civilizations. Most of its planets were in the primordial stages of life development,
with only a few worlds exhibiting nascent signs of biological evolution. The Anakh Atlantean Empire,
later known as the Annunaki, was not a monolithic entity but rather a complex
amalgamation of diverse species. This diversity was further augmented by additional groups that
allied with the Anakh Empire on Nibiru and Earth. The Anakhim represented a distinct culture rather
than a single species, born from a confluence of various seeder species through interbreeding and
intermarriage following the royal union of Tiamat and Tybarion. The contingent that journeyed with
An to the Bootes star system included genetic lineages from reptilian, human, and gray
origins. An himself was a particularly prominent hybrid, embodying traits from human, gray, Lyran,
and reptilian species due to his mother Anakim Lu Ra, the granddaughter of Queen Tiamat herself.
Her line was distinguished by elongated heads, athletic muscular, tall from 8 to 14 feet, with
hybrids being 7 feet, smooth humanoid pale melanin and to dark melanin, lyran reptilian mammalian
features with a spectrum of asian-aarryn-indo african features with short pointed ears,
lion texture hair from dark and blonde hair, with blue, green and dark brown to hazel eyes.
In the early years of his reign, Supreme Emperor An as the patriarch of the Anakh
Atlantean Empire , was driven by an unrelenting quest for power, resources, and territorial
expansion. To achieve his ambitions, he sought to forge a closer alliance with
the ancient and immortal Queen Tiamat of Orion, the progenitor of his own race. Queen Tiamat,
in her prime, wielded immense power across the cosmos. However, her eldest daughter, Anakim,
harbored ambitions to usurp her throne. As Tiamat aged, she grew envy and jealousy of her daughter,
Anakim's strength, both physical and spiritual, grew in assimilation of Tiamat. Tiamat,
feeling her power waning and youth waning feared the inevitable replacement by her own progeny.
In a desperate bid to retain her power, Tiamat engineered a potion that would subdue Anakim Ra,
her own beloved daughter. News of this treachery reached King An,
the eldest son of Anakim, who intervened to save his mother from Tiamat's malevolent grip.
The outbreak of the Second War in Heaven marked a pivotal moment in galactic history of not only of
Orion but as well as Pleiades and Andromeda. The conflict was ignited by An's aggression towards
Queen Tiamat, driven by the belief that she had murdered his own mother and her refusal to
relinquish control of her empire and the humanoid colonies. Tiamat, convinced of An's unfitness to
inherit the celestial dominion, remained steadfast in her vow to protect the seeded beings and
civilizations of her world—a duty she had sworn to the council and her consort, Tybarion. To
counter An’s demands, Tiamat passed the empire to her son, Kingu. This decision enraged An,
leading to a nefarious scheme by the royal houses of the Anakh. The ensuing conflict caused
a rift within the Igigi legion and escalated into both terrestrial and celestial battles.
During this tumultuous period, Tiamat’s planet was home to four distinct colonies:
the Lemurians, a diverse and multiracial society; the Lyran colony; the Reptilian Draco;
and the Agarthans residing within Hollow Earth. To consolidate his power and conquest,
An dispatched his commanders to seize control of these colonies,
ordering them to capture all women from each refugee race and forcibly interbreed with them.
Through the Abzu, a quantum fluid matter resembling a mirror, Tiamat observed everything
her children, the Anakh royals, were planning. The great son of the north became powerful and
unforgiving. Although deeply disheartened, Tiamat changed her composure and heart to the spirit of
forgiveness and mercy. Her extensive experiences with warfare, love, and loss had left her weary
over countless eons, teaching her the power of the ether and mother Christ consciousness. At a time,
she had the power to decimate her entire line of the Anakah however her heart changed. She
had gained the trust of the higher seven lords of the 11 dimensions like the great
Enki and the great Ningishzidda, enabling her to incarnate at will beyond the universe and
simulation constraints. Despite intense pressure from her commanders and council to retaliate,
she chose restraint and ordered Igigi guardianships over the colonies on Tiamat.
In response to these aggressive maneuvers, Merlin of the Council of Five and the Galactic
Federation dispatched emissaries with a substantial military force to infiltrate
the Maytre's colonies on the nocturnal abandoned seed colony planet of Almu.
Tybarion of Sirius was appointed as a commander for this critical mission,
who had been away in the outer rims of the cosmos from Queen Tiamat for 3 shars. However,
during a seemingly diplomatic meeting, Tybarion and his emissaries were betrayed and lured to
their demise by the Megopei Maytre leaders. The grievous news of this betrayal reached Tiamat,
who was profoundly distressed. At this time, she was nurturing her last son,
Kingu, born from her union with Tybarion. Kingu was destined to become the new heir
to the cosmic legacy, inheriting the mantle of the Anakh royal bloodlines.
Within a shar, Kingu, prepared to confront An. Empowered by Kingu’s resolve,
Tiamat bestowed upon him two priceless gifts: vast reserves of gold from her planet and the
Tablets of Destiny, artifacts imbued with the power to rectify celestial planetary alignments.
During the ongoing conflict, Kingu demonstrated exceptional skill on the battlefield, Kingu's key
weapon was The Lunar Scythe, a crescent-shaped blade that would inflict devastating blows and
disoriented enemies with blinding light. It also generates localized gravitational fields
to pull or repel foes and unleashes tidal wave attacks. However King An was steps of ahead of
Kingu on the battlefield, he had captured targeted Kingu through his technological
weapon of electricity. In a ritualistic assembly, Kingu was executed but buried on Tiamat's moon
base. An and his commanders, towering 10-foot warriors, fiercely cut down Kingu's army both
in heaven and on Tiamat. The clashes unfolded across both terrestrial and celestial arenas,
with participants including the colossal Igigi, the Lyrans, and the Lemurians. Meanwhile,
early hominids, concealed in caves and lowland refuges, observed these celestial battles with
a sense of awe, though their understanding of the events remained rudimentary. As the war escalated,
Anakh commanders commenced the systematic abduction of defenseless innocents,
transporting them aboard their ships and further amplifying the war's scale and horror.
In a desperate measure to force Tiamat’s surrender,
An deployed devastating high-beam missiles against her. The impact was catastrophic,
shattering Tiamat’s planet into fragments. This destruction caused much of Tiamat’s debris to
intermingle with the remnants of Maldek within the asteroid belt. Despite the dire circumstances,
Tiamat, aboard her celestial vessel, attempted to salvage the fractured planet using the Tablets of
Destiny. This advanced technology enabled her to stabilize the scattered remains, leading to
the formation of a new world that would come to be known as Key, Terra, and eventually Earth. As the
new planet began to coalesce and stabilize, Queen Tiamat closed her eyes and released her spirit.
At that very moment, In a state of heightened desperation,
An ordered the deployment of the Brahmashirā Astra— onto Tiamat's celestial boat. The
detonation of this weapon caused a cataclysmic explosion that reverberated through space,
rendering all subsequent events inaudible . In the aftermath of this destruction of Tiamat's abode,
the presumed annihilation of Queen Tiamat was confirmed.
Following this cosmic upheaval, the Galactic Federation of Worlds arrived late to
mitigate the extensive physical and spiritual devastation inflicted upon the 3rd dimension
however they had enough time to kick out the the empire of Atlanteans from the dimension
temporarily to prevent them from further tampering with earth. The Anakh Empire,
now firmly established, assumed control over the remnants of Tiamat’s dominion and the Orion empire
previously ruled by Kingu. They retreated to new worlds and territories. At this the line of An was
solidified for all time and the story of An and Tiamat faded into history and later into myth.
Ashari, the fourth planet within the Thula system, emerged as a formidable gas giant
encircled by seven distinct rings. It is protected by impenetrable magnetic
fields and multiple layers of plasma barriers, rendering it virtually inaccessible. Serving as
the stronghold of the Anakh Empire, also known as the Old Empire, Ashari is the nucleus of
one of the most illustrious and powerful empires in the galaxy. It functions as a
crucial gateway to a parallel dimension, where the emperor and his court reside.
This parallel dimension in the 4th density, known as Nibiru by the Atlantean Anakh and their
original home world in Galaxy Urea, was named by Enki, a descendant of An. Enki’s celestial vessel
was also named "Nibiru, The Second." Subsequently, the Anakh emperor, Anu Rah—also known as Anu High
Supreme—led a migration to this galaxy with his court from their previous home world. Nibiru,
identified as the twelfth planet in the distant galaxy of Urea, was designated
to traverse interdimensionally to Earth, a planet that had once been part of the now-fallen Tiamat.
Approximately 497,000 years ago, the newly established planet Nibiru faced severe peril
as its atmospheric conditions and resources began to deteriorate. During this period,
the atlantean anakh niburian royal house was under the rule of King Lahma at this period.
Amid the mounting challenges of his reign, Prince Alalu—a descendant of An—successfully overthrew
Lahma. This upheaval triggered a crucial confrontation with another prince named Anu,
also a descendant of An, who contested Alalu's claim to the throne. Despite the challenge,
Prince Alalu managed to persuade Anu and the council to allow him to retain his kingship.
In the course of time, Prince Anu took as his consort an reptilian-Pleiadean hybrid princess
named Nammu. Although he was deeply devoted to her, Nammu was not of pure Atlantean lineage.
She later gave birth to Ea, also known as Enki, meaning "He Whose Home Is Water."
As the atmospheric and resource conditions on Nibiru continued to decline, discontent
among the civilization and atlantean royals grew under King Alalu’s rule. Anu, who had
been serving as the cup bearer, resolved to challenge King Alalu for the throne.
In due course, Alalu and An engaged in unarmed combat for the throne,
with Anu emerging victorious and leaving Alalu disgraced. Anu ascended to kingship, while Alalu
was missing. After relocating from Nibiru's Arakh-Nara to Ashkera for strategic reasons,
Anu married his queen and sister, Antu, who bore him Enlil and, later married an
Adari-Andromedan princess who bore him the daughter Ninmah also known as Ninharsag.
Subsequently, Anu moved the center of his empire to the Sirius B star system, adopting the names
Atlanteans and Sirians of the Anakh Empire, later the term Annunaki would be created . Anu
established the capital of this new empire in the Arakh-Nara system at a planet Nibiru.
Alalu fled to the lost planet known as Key which was once Tiamat, once believed to be part of the
legends of An. There, he discovered vast gold reserves and a breathable atmosphere. In response,
Anu organized a mission to the planet, leading to the establishment of Eridu and the mining
site Abzu. Alalu was given reign and charge of earth under King Anu's reign and observation.
Anu placed his own elite Igigi Star-pilots, the 'igigi', into orbits throughout the solar system.
Any transgression, any mistake made by Alalu, would bring down the wrath of his Highness,
King Anu. Alalu has a son with an Igigi pilot and he was named Kumbari.
To further secure the solar system, King Anu placed his own son, Prince Enki, in charge
of the elite IKU Starships, and a special group called the ‘IGIGI, the ‘Watchers’. His title would
be ‘Enlil', ‘Lord of Command’. To insure shipments of crucial resources remained intact and on time,
King Anu appointed his eldest Prince Enki and renamed the planet Earth after him.
Lord Prince Enlil would be based on earth, as would be his brother Prince Enki. Enlil would
travel the sky-ways, Enki would develop the system worlds and conduct continuing Genesis
experiments on the watery world of Uranus. Mining, production and metallurgical operations would also
fall into the realm of Prince Enki's control. In this way, the King was assured his hand would
extend over Alalu's solar system. Anu decreed Key to be renamed as Earth after Prince Ea.
And so it was for many periods. Former King Alalu would keep his word, producing the resources and
maintaining order in the Ninth Passageway, while King Anu reluctantly allowed a once hated foe
to remain in power in the Ninth Passageway. But Anu would never forget the injury he had
suffered under the hands of his uncle Alalu. When speaking of King Alalu duplicate palace,
the Great Anu always referred to it in an angry and disparaging manner. An ‘Impure Palace’,
he called it, his own Palace on Ashari was the ‘Pure One’, the Eridu Palace was the 'Dark One’.
King Anu would never forget the torments his father had endured by King Alalu,
his own uncle. The hatred of a lifetime welled up within his very being. King Alalu would live,
but he would pay for his sins against the family of Anu.
But history was about to repeat itself. For in the very heart of Eridu,
the grandson of King Alalu named Kumbari, heir apparent to the Throne of the solar system,
had become a far more powerful figure to the followers of King Alalu than King Anu was
comfortable with and time would tell on the rivalry of Anu and the offspring of Alalu.
Around 445,000 years ago, Enki, Anu's eldest son, led an Annunaki Atlantean crew to Earth,
where they found underground gold deposits in North Africa. Enki, also known as Ea,
named Earth after himself. A visit from Alalu led to disagreements,
which were ultimately resolved by seeking judgment from their father, King Anu. Anu's
visit to Earth delineated roles for his sons, marking a pivotal moment in Annunaki history.
250,000 years before the evolution of Homo sapiens, Enki and his sister Ninhursag conducted
experiments with Homo erectus DNA, resulting in the creation of Adamu and Ti-Amat, also known as
Eve, the first Homo sapiens. Initial infertility prevented reproduction, but in secret, Enki and
his son introduced two branches to the "tree of life," enabling procreation and shaping humanity's
genetic structure. During this period, Adapa, the earliest Homo sapiens sapiens, underwent genetic
enhancements, surpassing the Annunaki in power and consciousness. He became the first human capable
of harnessing unlimited sentient consciousness and containing the universe's power and knowledge
within his DNA, alongside his spouse Titi. This provoked envy among many Annunaki, as modern
humans' potential to surpass them spiritually and technologically became apparent. Enlil,
the lord of air, then decreed that humans should remain confined to the 3rd dimension.
As Earth's civilizations advanced, many interdimensional Annunaki visitors arrived,
including the Naascals, Andromedans, Lyrans, and Pleiadians. These Annunaki were assigned
to higher roles or lower Igigi commands based on their lineage and loyalty to Annunaki leaders.
Eventually, a particular mixed group of Annunaki Igigi, also known as the Watchers,
swore an oath to take earthly wives and mate with them. Their descent led to conflicts and
the emergence of the Nephilim, the children of the Annunaki Igigi. Enki's interventions
exacerbated tensions, culminating in a great flood. The survivors preserved the knowledge
of civilization, leading to the development of diverse cultures and civilizations.
Around 75,000 years ago, Earth saw its most advanced civilization,
with Atlantis and Lemuria thriving in harmony, exchanging knowledge,
and advancing consciousness. Genetic experiments diversified the modern human genome under the
influence of 22 extraterrestrial races, including various Annunaki factions,
while shortening human telomeres to limit power and consciousness escalation. Three Shars later,
disputes arose between Andromedan-Zeta races. In honor of his Adari-Zeta Pleiadian mother,
Enki engineered a specific dragon race in a laboratory, turning Earth into a safari for Adari
races and their fellow ancestors, the Andromedan beings. This was part of a peace treaty between
the Andromeda Hive Queen and Isis, designating Earth as a hunting ground for giant lizards.
Despite this golden age, disruptions occurred around 52,000 years ago with the manifestation
of a Tree of Life on Atlantis. The conservative Enlil considered ending the human experiment,
leading to a split between Enki's followers and those loyal to Enlil. Atlantis and Lemuria faced
challenges, but the memories of this utopian era endured in modern humans' cellular memory.
The Mesopotamian Sumerian civilization, the oldest human civilization was split
into regions. The biblical timeline begins and Ancient Kemet known as Egypt is established.
77,000 years ago, the eruption of Mt. Toba reduced the population to about
2,000 resilient individuals. Emerging from this adversity, civilizations concentrated around
the equator on Atlantis, Africa, and Lemuria, laying the groundwork for advanced cultures.
The Annunaki of Nibiru were intrigued by Atlantis during this time, as Enki had unearthed ancient
ruins dating back 200 million years. These ruins, though ancient, displayed advanced technology from
the first Draconians, a branch of the Annunaki royal family. When Enki discovered the site,
the Nacaals, another branch of the Annunaki from a distant star system, revealed themselves to him,
proclaiming, "I AM THE HIDDEN ONE... we are the many and we are the ancient ones returned,
the physical embodiment of the ONENESS PRINCIPLE... It is my duty to ignite
the barrier... so that all may understand that within the light, I am you and you are me..."
This revelation widened a growing divide in Annunaki
culture. Enki and his followers embraced the Nacaals' teachings,
evolving in consciousness and valuing a diverse Earthly and galactic culture, while Enlil and
the people of Nibiru grew more intolerant and aggressive, prioritizing the purity of the
Annunaki royal race. Anu and Enlil then decided to confine all of humanity within the 3D matrix.
The Nasscals Ramay became star brothers and part of the Annunaki empire. During Atlantis's
flourishing period, the Nasscals aligned with the Lemurian Empire,
ruled by Inlay, the great enemy of Atlantis. Unfortunately, the Ramay were left to fend for
themselves when Inlay initiated apocalyptic devastation. After the Younger Dryas event,
the Ramay settled in the underground regions of South and Central America.
They were instrumental in the rise of the Maya civilization,
significantly advancing sciences. They taught the Mayans about astronomy and time but departed when
the Maya civilization was at its peak. Despite the Ramay's contributions, the Mayans began performing
blood sacrifices in their name, elevating them to the status of gods with great superstition.
Neglected by Enlil, the Ramay came under the protection of the Galactic Federation
of Worlds. They did not seek refuge with the Anki region, as Earth was still under Enlil's
and his son Ninurta's guardianship. Local myths and folklore preserved their memory,
evidenced by ancient buildings aligned with the rising star Capella.
The Nacaals revealed the vast intergalactic community to the Annunaki of Nibiru,
ushering in an era of enhanced genetic experiments on human evolution. This brought various physical
features and cultures to Atlantis and Lemuria, with advanced extraterrestrial cities thriving
as interconnected hubs of consciousness and technology. This period left an
enduring mark on humanity's cellular memory, resonating with the idea of a utopian past.
Between 200,000 and 75,000 years ago, human culture on Earth gradually developed, and the
Homo sapiens population increased significantly and homo-sapien sapien had conquered and replaced
all humanoid species on earth besides their ancestral cousins, primates. The population
could no longer be confined solely to Mesopotamia, and mining operations expanded to North and South
America and the Pacific archipelagos islands, which would become known as Mu and later Lemuria.
The Annunaki ruler of Pacific islanders was Kumbari, son of Alalu and last rival of Anu.
Unfortunately, more aggressive Homo sapiens sometimes hunted peaceful, nomadic Neanderthals
and other earlier hominids in what would become Lemuria, however many annunaki began alte.
The Nacaals, resembling South Americans, protected their people in Lemuria and helped enhance the
culture and spiritual prowess of early hominids by teaching them to tap into their energy bodies
for guidance and protection. This marked the beginning of the Lemurian mystery schools,
where Ningishzidda, also known as Thoth, married a Naascal Ramay lemurian Princess known as Nut,
Thoth then became an ascended master and later established the Egyptian Mystery Schools on earth.
Despite some exceptions, when the two cultures met and mingled, they were relatively equal
in intelligence, though they had evolved differently. Annunaki-bred humans focused
on industry and technology, while Lemurians emphasized nature and spiritual development,
reflecting the ancient divide between "civilized" cultures descended from
the Atlanteans of Nibiru and the Nacaals of Lemuria' line.
37,000 years ago, The second catastrophe on earth occurs due to planetary system
movements and is recorded by Ningishzidda. Enki, orders his son Ningishzidda to rebuild
Ancient Kemet and he has a fallout with his brother Marduk also known as Amun Ra.
Pleiadian Annunaki, beginning their intermarriages and breeding sharing
ancestry with the Atlantean Hybrid Annunaki, they then genetically modified groups such as
the Olmecs and Nordics and seeded indigenous native people in early North America.
Many of these beings later withdrew underground to maintain the purity of their lineage, residing
in the hollow Earth city Agartha, uninterested in mingling with more aggressive bloodlines.
36,000 years ago, the first of the great pyramid
wars began. Inanna daughter of enlil becomes a goddess.
Enki orders Thoth also known as Ningishzidda to Mesoamerica
and writes emerald tablets. The Mayan Aztec civilization and indigenous Americans begin.
On the surface, Earth faced new challenges. The contract between Marduk, also known as Amun Ra,
who had Draconian Omicron blood favoring winged dragon men for peace, expired. This
led to the pyramid wars, during which Annunaki royals created an artificial Ice Age—a nuclear
winter. Civilizations that had expanded north and south retreated towards the equator,
and Pangaea eventually broke apart. As a result, human cultures concentrated
into technologically and spiritually advanced civilizations known as Lemuria and Atlantis.
Other groups, seeking shelter, discovered ancient underground caverns and cities,
some populated by Dracos and others by more benevolent groups like the Agarthans.
This migration to the underground world continued for hundreds of thousands of years,
especially during times of surface hardship, leading to
the development of Agartha, an inner Earth civilization with cities spanning the globe.
The six-year nuclear winter and the subsequent 1,000-year Ice Age reduced the population to
around 2,000 people, who were the most intelligent, resilient, and adaptable.
The civilizations that emerged from this winnowing would be the most advanced Earth has ever seen,
even to this day. This winnowing nearly eradicated most early hominid
groups, allowing Homo sapiens sapiens to become the dominant human group on Earth,
though some spiritually advanced early hominid groups, such as Yetis and Bigfoot, did survive.
In the annals of lost earthly history, the decline of iconic civilizations eventually
led to an epochal event, echoed in religious texts and indigenous tales as The Great Flood
or The Great Cataclysm. This journey towards devastation spanned an incredible 40,000 years.
While there were periods of advancement, Atlantis experienced a noticeable shift
from consciousness exploration towards a focus on science, technology, and military prowess.
This shift can be largely attributed to the 13 Royal Bloodlines, known as the Cabal. Despite
the overarching influence of the Nacaals and Maya, the Cabal subtly inserted themselves
into ruling society, promoting technological marvels and various instructions from Amun Ra
on how to control and enslave the minds of souls. These wonders captivated the masses,
subtly diverting their attention from consciousness growth. Over time,
the Cabal adeptly positioned themselves within all echelons of power, pushing for
dominance and militarization. The Cabal are long descendants of Amun Ra and the Sumerian King List.
Their motives aligned with the subterranean Ciakarr Draco Empire,
forming a persistent alliance. Although many assume Draco to be synonymous with the Cabal,
they are merely a part of it. As Atlantis leaned towards militarism and global governance,
Lemuria, striving to protect its spiritually inclined populace,
became distant and defensive. This rift inevitably spiraled into hostilities.
As decline approached, the Pleiadian Annunaki, distressed by Earth's dropping
vibrational frequency, began distancing themselves. They retreated to Shamballa and
other 5th Density bases, including Venus. Other consciousness-attuned groups from both Lemuria
and Atlantis sought refuge in the evolving 4D civilization of Agartha, away from escalating
terrestrial conflicts. At this time, Thoth, the son of Enki, was regarded by the ascended
masters. He taught the children of Lemuria and Atlantis about the Inner Christos, the Law of One,
and Maharata realities. Pleiadians and Sirius B alliances saw him as a messenger and peacekeeper
between them and the Atlantean Annunaki royals, being of Reptilian Draconian origin.
The Cloister Dora Teura Plates, frequency holders and transmitters, were created alongside 12 Signet
Shields, resembling hubcaps. Each Signet Shield was given to the angelic human races in 2,460 BC
as part of the Emerald Covenant. These were remote activators for the stargates. Without
the upper plate, activating the shield to open any stargate was impossible. Thoth was entrusted with
Plate 11 to transmit information to assist the Anu Melchizedek races, including some corrupt ones,
in starting bioregenesis. It was agreed by the Annunaki royal families that they would
oversee Earth and manage its time matrix. Thoth then decided to side with his family and the
Eiyani colonies, remnants of the Lemurian continent after its destruction in 50,000
BC. The Eiyani Colony was positioned where the activator cue site for Stargate 12 was located,
connecting to the Halls of Amorea D6 Stargate to send enough frequency to
break the Nibiruan crystal holding grid of Amun Ra, in present-day Kauai, Hawaii.
Thoth selected a few Annu Melchizedek priests to work with the Templar mechanics. Their role
was to help break the Nibiruan Atlantean crystal grid. They sabotaged the entire mission. Thoth
returned from Nibiru to Earth with raiders and mercenaries to the Eiyani Colony. Upon arrival,
he offered the priests a chance to sleep with and breed with Eiyani women. He jammed the
communication lines to the Inner Earth races and to Sirius B, which were the main outposts
receiving off-planet information. He then falsely informed the Pleiadian inhabitants
that the Pleiadian Council had surrendered, threatening that if they did not join him,
everyone would be tortured and killed, and Earth would be destroyed. He insisted that if
they cared about other lifeforms on Earth, the Eiyani women would agree to be their breeders.
The Pleiadians realized that the Atlantean royals had control of certain stargates,
suggesting that the House of Anu controlled the entire planet.
This event became known as the Great Deception of Thoth by the Galactic Federation of Worlds.
It was later revealed that Thoth's family had been threatened by the Ciakarr Empire,
forcing him to have Anunnaki of Nibiru breed with the Eiyani women.
32,000 years ago, Enlil, having resided on Nibiru for some time,
received astronomical findings predicting a near-catastrophic disaster involving a close
encounter between Nibiru and Earth. Unlike Earth, the water-scarce Nibiru would not endure seismic
aftershocks and tsunamis. For Enlil, this seemed like a perfect opportunity to 'cleanse the Earth'
and restart the experiment. He mandated silence regarding this impending doom.
Enki, however, independently discovered this astronomical truth. Despite his attempts to
share this knowledge being blocked by Enlil, Enki's love for his people and
Earth's civilizations drove him to secretly inform the Maya. They embarked on a mission
to preserve Earth's biodiversity by storing DNA in an "Ark"—a spacecraft,
not a traditional boat. Submersible vessels for survivors were also constructed, overseen
by the chief engineer, Zisudra, also known as biblical Noah, the albino human son of Enki.
